biography.title: Biography of the founder
paragraphs: Anthony comes from a family of emigrants: he was born in Russia and has been living with his parents in Canada since the age of 2. The family moved from Toronto to Montreal, thanks to which Anthony is fluent in both English and French. After graduating from university, Anthony worked at a Canadian startup developing a crypto exchange. Here was the first acquaintance with the world of trading. This direction captured Anthony so much that he devoted all his free time to analyzing stock charts and studying trading strategies. There was plenty of literature on investing and trading, but most of the books were about the stock market and conservative investment vehicles. As for innovations, such as cryptocurrencies, there were very few materials in those years. However, the thirst for knowledge and the desire to develop gave Anthony the strength to thoroughly study the issue. As a result, the hobby turned into a profession, and later became the work of his whole life. Having achieved success as a trader and having earned the first serious capital, Anthony opens his own brokerage office in Toronto and becomes the founder of an analytical center in Ottawa. As a result, the desire to scale leads Anthony to the idea of launching his own international investment and educational startup in order to open the world of trading, investment and making money on the Internet to thousands of people. That's how EverClub was born!
